Some of the reviews I read were negative because you can only pour 10 ounces of water in the reservoir at a time. For me this was a positive. I bought this appliance because of the convenience of being able to brew one  piping hot coffee or tea at a time . So I guess you have to consider your lifestyle and what you're looking for when you purchase .

review_text: After searching all over and not finding the internal 6, 8, and 10oz. water measuring indicator, clearly marked on the diagram in the booklet that the machine came with, I finally called Keurig.  The person who took my call diagnosed the problem right away.  They changed the machine, but didn't change the instruction booklet!  The machine no longer has ANY measuring gauge, as illustrated and described in the book.  Instead, you're supposed to fill your coffee mug with water, dump it in, and then brew your coffee.  You would think that for a $65 piece of plastic that brews coffee, Keurig could afford to print an updated instruction guide to go with it.

The main thing to prolong your Keurig is at least once a month run vinegar through it, W hen I get tired of my cobalt blue by the way I have had it for 3+ yrs no problems, I bring out my Chilli pepper, great price great buy.

name: DesertOwl
review_text: Seriously, don't purchase this item through Amazon.  Buy it locally.  I thought I'd save money over local prices, but the thing wouldn't work straight out of the box.  I also foolishly purchased the warranty - and the coverage was promptly denied for the reason that "You appear to have received an item that was already damaged."  Really???  I had had a Keurig machine purchased locally (shout out to Target) that lasted me 5 years (admittedly, light use - cup or two a day).  I loved that little machine.  This one was defective straight out of the box - the heating element inside doesn't work.  Oh, and try and do an exchange through Amazon - no go, there, either.  It keeps telling me there's no credit card on file.  Ok, geniuses, how did I pay for the thing in the first place?  Yet oddly, it lets me ask for a refund.  The sad thing is, they will probably simply put this back on the shelf and sell it to someone else.  Downside, save yourself a headache, don't purchase small appliances that might be damaged through shipping from Amazon.
review_title: Save your money!!  And don't purchase the warranty, either!  Total rip-off.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: willy
review_text: Thought I'd have to wait a while in order to get this Keurig in this blue color I fell in love with. My very 1st one and after being scared off by so many negative reviews of keurigs in general I decided to go ahead. It came 2 weeks earlier than promised and so far, after3-4 months it has worked perfectly evry time. I bought my own "K-CUPS" from Keurig, a 2 pack, and fill my own with Starbucks coffee. I have even begun to drink my coffee black because its so good and so hot every time. Plus the blue color looks outstanding in my yellow kitchen!!
review_title: ... this Keurig in this blue color I fell in love with. My very 1st one and after being ...
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Giia Weigel
review_text: Not a very good buy... First of, the entre machine is a bit wobbly (but, as it\s plastic, nothing better is to be expected). Then it throws temper tantrums at times for no apparent reasons - brews only half of the water, does't brew at all, or - the latest -  doesn't even turn on! Needless to say, this one goes into bin. BUT, if you are happy with a machine with a 6 week life-span, you should be good.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: DTaylor
review_text: It works maybe 40% of the time, usually spits out clear liquid with no coffee. It has no size buttons like the other Keurigs, so the amount of coffee is contingent upon the amount of water you put it. Despite this, the amount of actual coffee is always either overflowing or less than half a cup. I've had this for 4-5 months and have had maybe 3 good cups from it. A disaster - skip this one.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Amazon Customer
review_text: I'm enjoying the coffee maker, and happy to have it.  The "flaw" that was reported as the reason for the low price doesn't seem to be there; at least I can't find one.  However, I have noticed that water seems to magically disappear; far more than should be from evaporation.  I put in 10 oz of water and get only 8 oz of coffee.  Something you have to adjust for. Where does it go? In the K-cup, plus evaporation?  That much? That's about 20%!  Is anyone else having this happen?
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: granice
review_text: Makes terrible coffee and not even hot at all.Very disappointed will return it.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: gingblack@aol.com
review_text: I think that this Keurig is a very good solution for people that only want a quick morning coffee and quick cups  during the afternoon. It is low cost compared to other Keurigs. The feature I like but others may not sit the fact that I pour fresh water into coffee maker and I get what I put into the machine.  Other Keurigs have reservoirs usually plastic where you leave  water sitting all day or all night. I prefer the ease and freshness of single cup.
review_title: I think that this Keurig is a very good solution for people that only want a quick morning ...
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Todd Newman
review_text: Bought this for the camper and it works great, takes up less space than the other unit and everyone gets their coffee, tea, hot chocolate etc
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: bbwolfjr
review_text: We purchased this because my 92 mother-in-law can use it easily. After reading other reviews we decided that having to replace it after a year would be acceptable. At 4 months (to the day) from receiving it the machine has quit working.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Kelly B
review_text: This keurig arrived on time without damage.  It was a great gift for my mother-in-law because it doesn't have the extra water tank.  She puts it away in the cabinet after each use so the extra tank would have been inconvenient for her.  She has used it for a month without issues so it is a hit!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Jagie
review_text: this little compact is ok...just. don't think it'll have all the bells and whistles your bigger kurigs have. this is great for a quick fix.  the color is cool but because i have the bigger, more hi tech kurig, this one just didn't stand a chance.  i keep this in my office so i don't have to run to the lunchrooms to get my coffee fixes.  its a kurig but more manual operating than i would have liked.
review_title: this is great for a quick fix
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: nursecasi
review_text: difficult to see water line. supposed to add the water needed for each cup as you make each cup, but if you do the events out of sequence, the water goes into the reservoir. . .and I cannot see the water line to see how much more to add.  So, then its a guessing game when I hit the brew button. Other than that, good cheap quality product for the office use.
review_title: good cheap quality product for the office use
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: dyanne
review_text: I have had a yellow one for several years. Don't use it every day as I sometimes drink tea, but I like Dunkin Donuts hazelnut coffee and this is perfect for me. I use any size cup I want (6-8-l0 oz) and fill it with water and pour it in the top. I get that amount OUT. Easy to use. Perfect and COMPACT for me without a huge coffee maker taking up space. I read somewhere that you should leave the top OPEN after use, for awhile, to let the insides dry out and prevent mold, which is NOT listed on the paperwork. True or false, I don't now, but I leave it open along with the area where you REMOVE the K-cup. I would absolutely buy another one!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: glendurnich
review_text: This is the perfect little compact machine. We bought this one to take with us when we travel. We take it right into our room and plug it in and have our favorite cup of coffee right there perfect. If we have found a special coffee we can use our own reusable K cup and enjoy that coffee on our trip. What more could you want. Great coffee anytime anyplace.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Amazon Customer
review_text: This was  ordered for my husband s birthday. My thought was it was better to make individual servings as opposed to  pot. The first one we received was bad from the start, although I did not realize it. It would often make only 1/2 cup or be luke warm. There were coffe grinds in the finished coffee. We contacted Kurig and the customer service was great. First we tried all the troubleshooting procedures, but they ended up sending us a new one. Unfortunately it started doing the same thing in less than a month. They offered to send us another one, but would not refund our money because it was not purchased directly through Kurig. There is definitely a defect in this product and I would advise folks to stay clear of the smaller sized Kurigs.
review_title: My thought was it was better to make individual servings as opposed to pot
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Jinks
review_text: I love a single serve coffee maker. And I love how this is simple and small and quick and efficient. But if you like your coffee strong, you will need to make your own coffee pods with one of the plastic k cups out there. That is easy enough. So I use all the regular kcups to keep in the drawer I bought for underneath, but I often make my own with the plastic reusable kcup. Like this machine VERY much. Four stars because I wish it made just a little bit larger cup of coffee.
review_title: I love a single serve coffee maker
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Angie
review_text: It was fun while it lasted, but the machine broke less than a year after purchase and I can t get assistance from Keurig with a replacement. I cleaned it frequently, as the instruction manual described, but the machine no longer detects that it has a coffee pod and won t start the brew sequence.
review_title: Lasted less than a year with frequent maintenance
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: ptlmjmwii
review_text: Not my first Keurig; have one at home  Purchased a smaller unit for RV camping, returned the first one the same day I received.  Took a chance and reordered. After a few weekends of using the second one it is also malfunctioning.  Would not recommend this unit to anyone.
review_title: If I purchased at a local store I'd return it!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Tobi
review_text: Simple to set up and use. Instructions provided were clear and helpful. Takes less than 5 min to use.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: A. Maynard
review_text: returned as the machine would not heat. tried several times as per the directions and got nothing, no hot water, no coffee, nothing..Returned for refund and purchased a different maker.
review_title: returned as the machine would not heat. tried several ...
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: SG
review_text: Done with keurig.  This is the second one I have purchased that stopped working with very little use. Bought this small one for a vacation home that was barely used. The coffee stop coming out. Just made a humming noise and nothing came out. Very disappointed. It s now in the garbage can. Last Keurig for me
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: mpowell
review_text: This is the second one purchased. The first one lasted less than one month. Returned it for the one I have now which stopped working last week. It is less than 6 months old and I do not use it for my every morning coffee because I want more than one cup. Have just used it for those special times when one cup is desired. I would not recommend purchasing one. Seems to have the same problem as the last one, which is will not run the water through to the cup.
review_title: I would not recommend purchasing one
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Anna
review_text: Junk. This is not rocket science. I used this to make one or two cups a day since I bought it and religiously cleaned and it kept it in perfect condition. Last week, I made a cup and no water came out, just a humming noise. So now it's useless and even if it is under some kind of warranty, I will be expected to pay to ship a defective product that's six months old back in for repair.
review_title: Updated review: six months later after light use, it doesn't work now.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: deborah colvin
review_text: Love love, love my Keurig. Bought refillable cups and filters to use it. I just could not bring myself to spend so much on pods that are not recyclable. Keurig really needs to sell the refillable cups at a reasonable price. It is possible. I bought 3 for less than $4.00 at Marshalls. However, the paper filters are $6.00 for 100 at Walmart. Still a bargain price.  Really Keurig? Think of our landfills.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: J. S.
review_text: This Keurig is very compact which is nice.  It does not have a storage tank so you don't have to worry about the ick in there as we had in our last one we recently learned...  It is a very bright pretty blue.  However, it is so small and low that you can only fit a coffee cup under it and not our thermos type things we use...so a little inconvenience.  Fits on counter better though.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Abby
review_text: I love my mini Keurig. It's so convenient to make your own coffee at home and taste as good or even better when I make my coffee with my Keurig. I have it for a month now and no issues at all. The only thing is I drink 16 oz coffee every morning filling up my travel mug, I have to use 2 k-cup. The coffee taste so much lighter if I only use 1 k-cup even on 10 oz water. Transferring the coffee to my travel mug and brewing 2 times is the only hassle for me. But I can live with that. Over all I love the size and the ease of use. I also bought a a reusable k-cup and filter and use it once in a while. I recommend to have the reusable k -cup too if you wanna save more money on k-cups
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Sherry Ground
review_text: I love the color and the size! I have never been able to brew a cup. Someone advised me there Must be a part missing. The part that pokes a hole in the bottom of of the k-pod.
review_title: I love the color and the size
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Kev D.
review_text: Maybe it's just me but I constantly end up with too much water in the reservoir which ends up flow out of the machine all over my counter every time I make coffee, which isn't helpful. I fill it to the 10 oz level and it leaks before it hits the top of the 10oz indicator.
review_title: Not super happy with it. Im hoping it breaks soon.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: MaryMartha
review_text: I love having this brewer at home. The design has changed.  There used to be measurement marks inside the top, to measure water.  Now, you need to get a measuring cup.  Perhaps I will mark the outside with a permanent marker ... it looks clear enough to do that.  Makes great beverages.  I find myself having more of my coffee at home than going to a coffee shop, which saves money.
review_title: Would be 5 stars, except for not having a way to measure water inside of lid - old style did have
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: B. Conrad
review_text: I just love this little coffee maker.  This is my second one.  Yeah, they do wear out, but I used my last one 2 or 3 times a day for at least 4 years.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Star Hunter
review_text: I bought this because of all the bad things you hear about the Kuerig with the water tank... which is what I had prior to this. I seriously regret getting this. Takes awhile to make a cup of coffee and the taste is not as good as my other unit. Also, does seem a bit proxy for the price one pays for this. I'm not really thrilled with this at the moment. Got to get used to it I guess.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: kelli
review_text: Update:. Called Keurig customer servive, and because I had proof of purchase (that's one great thing about Amazon--you'll always have the receipt!), They were able to take care of me!!! Give them a call!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Patchy Fog
review_text: We had a smaller Keurig that outlived its usefulness, so we ordered this one. This is a one-cup-atta-time coffee maker and uses the familiar K-cups (if you were not sure, because the description is a bit unclear). You can fill the brewer with 6-to-10 ozs. of water, using the somewhat primitive levels found inside the fill area on the left side. This brewer takes a little longer to make a cup than our previous unit.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Ase
review_text: Great small coffee maker. Makes coffee quickly and easily. Best advice from a reviewer was to use the cup/mug you are using to pour waiter into tank. Know how much water your cup holds first and then you will never overfill.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Kim
review_text: Works great. Threw away my other Keurig without first cleaning it with vinegar. That was stupid. Keurig users - remember to run vinegar threw it when it stops working. Don't just throw it away like I did. Only one thing is a 15 oz. coffee mug doesn't fit under it.
review_title: Works great. Threw away my other Keurig without first cleaning ...
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: J. Martinez
review_text: So far it works great. It is the compact unit so it certainly has some limitations. The reservoir has room for 1 cup only and tall cups won't fit . I knew all of this when I got it but for me it is occasional use and I didn't want it to take up a bunch of counter space. I am happy with the purchase.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: MB Lovestoread
review_text: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!  I had a K-Mini that lasted about a year and had to replace it because the pump had gone bad.  I ordered a new one on January 17, 2018, and the pump went bad within 2 weeks.  Keurig sent me a replacement unit, and the exact same thing happened within 2 weeks -- heats up, no coffee comes out.  I wanted to return the unit for refund, as I have no interest in receiving another piece of junk.  Keurig will not do refund.  Not a happy customer.
review_title: Very Poor Quality - 2 Fails in 1 Month
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: gman
review_text: I only drink coffee in the morning and usually only one cup, two at the most. I needed a single maker instead of the large one I had. The Keurig has worked great. I also bought an adapter to use regular coffee but it is easier to use the K cups. Only downside is the price of K cups but ease of use is worth it. I highly recommend this machine.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: joy's division
review_text: We bought this and immediately were disappointed. It's very cheaply made. Thin cheap plastic, clunky, it's like a cheap plastic toy. The water is warm.not hot. It takes forever to brew. Ours worked for a month. Then had to return.
review_title: Dont do it, spend a little more.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: MA
review_text: This one is much easier to carry and move around. We used to have the larger version for many years. We enjoy this smaller one which is so light weight. We are seniors.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Amazon Customer
review_text: I purchased this Keurig to use in my dorm room because of its compact size. It worked very well and I like the fact that I only add the amount of water that I need for my cup as opposed to having a large tank that is constantly full of water. I love the Jade color, and it is much quicker to make a beverage than any other method. It is even very convenient to heat up water for a cup of tea. Also, I don't usually notice a lingering flavor of coffee if I just want to heat up water.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Tanya V
review_text: Very disappointed with this product. The water is warm, not hot. The coffee is very weak. A majority of the coffee grounds are still dry after brewing a cup. I try packing and not packing the ground coffee, changing the coarseness, etc. Didn't make a difference. The coffee was still weak and grounds mostly dry.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Mysterious Old Lady
review_text: After using four of these over a three year period, I've given up.  They just don't last.  The unreliability of the product offsets the convenience of it.  Kuerig surely could have bettered this by now.  Expensive to buy and use, it is just not worth it.
review_title: After using four of these over a three year period ...
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Rebecca F.
review_text: I really didn't like this Keurig. It's largest size didn't even fill a coffee cup. It clogged so easily and so fast, even with us using filtered water. Spend the extra $10 or so and get the next one up. The color was nice, but that's the only good thing about it.
review_title: I really didn't like this Keurig
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Grady
review_text: We had one of these last through thousands of cups of coffee.  When it had some challenges, we bought a new one here -- but it didn't even work!  So we sent this back, and while waiting, did another de-scaling of our existing one -- and now it works fine again.
review_title: did another de-scaling of our existing one -- and now it works fine again. So it's a solid starter K-Cup machine ...
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: F. Kaser
review_text: UPDATE: Spoke to Customer Service at Keurig and they are replacing the coffeemaker free of charge. Hopefully this second one will work.
review_title: Waiting to taste my first cup of brewed coffee
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: rd
review_text: I had high hopes for this machine, but it has been a failure.  After working for about 2 days, it started to produce just little drips, filling the bottom of the cup with coffee.  I looked at the Keurig website and learned how to unclog the needles, but unfortunately that hasn't solved the problem, and I still get only a dribble.  Not sure what the problem is, but it has been a waste of money and without the packaging it can't be returned.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Elf
review_text: I am Super Happy with my Keurig K-Mini Single Serve machine. My past machines were taking up too much room in my new home that I am downsizing into but hated giving up the convience of my quick tea coffee & these days Hot Chocolate!! There is no mess, it fits perfect in the corner and looks neat and clean. I can still have my full variety of K-cups.  You fill the fill the desired amount of water you want pour it in the top and hit BREW. No longer hitting several buttons trying to figure out what size and what brew to use.
review_title: Super easy and tastes delicious just like the larger machines!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Santa Ynez
review_text: Sometimes it works, other times it doesn't.  I purchased this single-serve machine for family vacations in the mountains.  Some of us drink leaded coffee and some of us drink unleaded.  Good thing there was a back-up coffee maker at the cabin, because this particular Keurig model isn't 100% reliable.
review_title: Works when it feels like it.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: L. Wayman
review_text: I would send this back - but I've thrown away all the packaging - the water does not get hot enough and it is hard to fit a tall cup underneath.  but it's ok I guess I don't  drink a lot of coffee.. I purchased it for my cappuccino.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Chelsea
review_text: Love this Keurig k-mini. I bought this one because I don't like the thought of drinking water that's been sitting in a tank for any period of time. Works wonderfully, I make coffee for my boyfriend every morning and send it with him to work. Would buy again! Love the size also.
review_title: Works wonderfully and the size is great!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Margaret Taylor
review_text: I was hesitant with so many mixed reviews but thought mine would be different. Mistake! Worked for a few days then the water wouldn't drop down into the tank. Returned for a refund (sad face)! I really wanted it to work.  Mine was brand new and the packaging was amazing so I didn't have those issues which many others seem to have had.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: tink
review_text: I bought this to take on vacation, gotta have my Keurig!! It works great but know that it only makes one cup at a time. You have to add water to the machine before making each cup. I didn't mind because it was small enough to fit in my duffle bag with the clothes and other items i needed for my trip. Love it!!!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Dune 83
review_text: What kind of water must you use? Don't use tap water nor reverse osmosis  only bottled provided it's not  RO . Google it and you will be told by several correspondents  that  keurig  is only interested in selling filters.  The unanswered question is, does RO contain minerals or not.  Anyway it's OK if you only want a quick  single  cup of mediocre coffee.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Michael Mcgrew
review_text: I purchased this item and within 2 days it quit working, the water pump would not pump, I returned this item and received a replacement and within a month it quit working, the water pump would not pump water, I tried to return this item for a refund to purchase another brand or model, but Amazon would not allow me to return the item.
review_title: Keurig...Great customer service...K15 Single Serve Compact...Bad Coffee Maker
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: DPT2019
review_text: I had the larger keurig, but got rid of it for this one. It s much smaller and simpler, with less chance of mold from keeping water in the tank (as with the bigger keurig). This one is so much better. The only complaint is the height of the area where you place a coffee mug; I had to buy all new mugs and search hard for short mugs because most of mine are too tall.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Kelly Richard
review_text: The unit sent to me does not heat the water to a temperature suitable for making drinkable coffee.
review_title: Dispensed coffee temp varies greatly, not uniformly drinkable coffee
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: JA
review_text: Love it!  Easy to set up, delivery was super, and simple process.  Good cup of coffee, too.  Keurig is a marvelous company!  Superb equipment and outstanding Green Mountain coffee products.  Do not hesitate, and you will not be sorry.
review_title: The BEST coffee maker out there!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: David Fancher
review_text: This is the third Keurig I have bought- this one was for my father who lives alone. He does not always have coffee but wanted to able to make a cup for himself without wasting the rest of the pot. It was great for about 6 months now it gets clogged with every 2nd cup in spite of declaring every 2 weeks
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Sdd
review_text: I bought this Keurig because it was small enough to fit in my dorm and had used it many times with no problem. 2 weeks after using it, I start my cup and walk away. My keurig started making very loud abnormal noises so I rush over to find coffee splattered everywhere and smoke pouring from my now glowing Keurig. I poured water on it until the smoke and red glow were gone. This was the first time anything has happened like this to any of my Keurig products. Just be careful before you buy this product.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Amazon Customer
review_text: It does what it is supposed to do...one cup at a time. The downside is that the machine makes an audible hummmmmm at all times even when turned off. Kind of irritating.
review_title: It does what it is supposed to do.. ...
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Ruth T. Shapiro
review_text: I have tried two of these. Each one lasted about 6 weeks. Very disappointed in this model. I have used the larger Keurig coffeemakers for a long time with no problem. I am trying the new model, K200 Plus, which is more streamlined and not as wide as the large Keurigs, and holds 2 cups of water. Time will tell.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Dawn M. Grimes
review_text: I am so happy with this Keurig. It sits perfectly on one corner of my craft desk and is so easy to use. You simply turn on the power, open the top lid, pour in water up to the 6,8 or 10 oz level marker, close the lid......and you hear the water going down into the reservoir. Then you lift the hande to put in the Keurig k-cup and close it.....whereby the brew light comes on. Just press the brew light. It's so quick and easy...I used to have a much larger unit with a big attached water reservoir but I like this one much better.....always fresh water that I put in. The size can fit anywhere. Very lightweight and easy to clean. I highly recommend it!
review_title: Perfect Size and Easy to Use
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: PEG
review_text: This is the 2nd Keurig we have had. The first one lasted a long time and finally had to be replaced. This was a really good price and was shipped immediately. I highly recommend Keurig Single Serve K-Cup. It is compact fits nicely on my counter top and makes a perfect cup of coffee every time.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Rebecca
review_text: Works correctly less than half of the time... I knew that a lot of the reviews were bad, but really wanted the small size and the platinum color.  Used a Nespresso for years and got turned off by the exorbitant pod prices.  Guess i ll go back.  This machine is worthless!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: J.
review_text: I always wanted to buy a Keurig machine but wasn't necessarily fond of clutter on my kitchen counter. I used this machine when I stayed at a friend's cabin and loved the small footprint. I immediately bought one upon returning home & I still love it to this day!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Brandon
review_text: I saved 30 bucks by buying this on Amazon. Works great and is a breeze to use. It'll brew any of the keurigs up to 10ozs and I even use it some time to just heat up water for bagged tea.
review_title: Making coffe or tea is a breeze!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Tammy Sears
review_text: I started having issues with this machine not heating.  I called Keurig.  I was informed my purchase I made through Amazon was for a K10.  Someone apparently switched the unit.  I feel ripped off as I purchased a K15.  I had only used it about 8 times.  Check your model numbers!
review_title: Are you getting what you paid for?
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Amazon Customer
review_text: I have had at least 6 of these.  always had a big one.  This is the best one ever.  Water is always fresh and it is so quick.  Takes up hardly any room on my counter
review_title: This is the best one ever
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: J.M.F.
review_text: My brand new coffee maker worked for one week before it wouldn't make a cup of coffee any longer. I put it with last year's keurig one cup coffee maker. I now have 3 of them, as my husband bought me one to keep at my card givers job. Not one of them work now, so I am of the opinion that they are worthless unless you can throw away (rounded up, not exact price) 70.00 every year.
review_title: When they do work right they make a great cup of coffee, for a short time.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: karen r. cummings
review_text: This is fabulous.  We had to go to a reunion and on vacation- away from our big Keurig for ten days.  It is terrible not to have our regular coffee.  This worked great, was light, easy and simple to use and keep clean.  This will go on all of our trips, and we may bring it out when we have company, or use it upstairs.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: L.K. Clifton
review_text: I love this little Keurig coffee pot.  I have one in the kitchen and we bought one for our back patio.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: T. Harris
review_text: This is my 3rd Keurig, I like that you don't need to put in a filter for this one, I love the convience of dropping in your K-Cup and pushing a button, then coffee's ready! I highly recommend this one if
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Kari
review_text: Two stars, only because it was fabulous for the 3 1/2 months that it actually worked.  I had the same brewer for three years before I had to replace it with this one.  This one just stopped running water through.  I took the needles out and cleaned them and got two more cups of coffee before it completely stopped working again.  I am done with Keurig Machines.  Going back to the good ole' ground beans and 12 cups of coffee!
review_title: Going back to the good ole' ground beans and 12 cups of coffee
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Alexandra
review_text: We love this little machine. We have had no problems with operation or it's function. Do read the instructions carefully before using it; there is a simple four-step procedure to operating it and if you do one step out of sequence, the machine won't function. Very simple to operate, though, as we do it when we're half asleep most of the time.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Marilyn Gore
review_text: I purchased this Keurig single serve because my sister had one and it was the first one I had ever actually seen in use.  I spend a lot of evenings in my studio and a single cup of coffee when I wanted one fits the bill.  I do use it quite a bit (more than I thought I would) and I'm very pleased with the performance and price.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Mari
review_text: Great little, light Keurig. If you don t mind filling up each time, this model works great for just simple coffee, tea, and hot water. Only reason for not giving it 5 stars is that it sometimes the water doesn t appear to all go in and you get a half a cup and need to re-do it. There s water standing in the reservoir so it s not lack of water.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Jerry Marsh
review_text: good price, fast shipping, item exactly as stated, works perfectly.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Nidia
review_text: I have used it 6 times in the last 3 months and now the water not longer comes out hot! Loved it while it worked, but now I regret this purchase, and due to my lack of use i can't return it :'-(
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: grace
review_text: I'm very happy with this product. The water is hot enough. Easy to clean. And perfect size in counter. Few things to share - some of my coffee mugs don't fit (even removing the tray). The machine panics if you add too much water and it spills out or you need to run sequence twice to completely empty. But overall really glad I got it !
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Julie
review_text: This silver one is very nice looking and works good. The only complaint I have is you can only fit a small mug in the cup area, even if you pull out the bottom part, it doesn't give much more space. I like to take my coffee to go, so I use a glass measuring cup and then pour it into my travel mug! Extra step, but it works!
review_title: Can only fit a small mug in cup area
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: tinear55
review_text: unit does not heat water hot enough.  I have taken to heating the mug of water in the microwave to the proper temp, then pouring it into the coffeemaker. that works, but it is an extra step.  takes away the convenience of the operation.  maybe I just got a bad unit, but it's about 30 degrees short of the right temperature.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Lonestarr602
review_text: Not worth the price, and the coffee was not especially hot.  I tried using the My K-Cup Reusable Coffee filters with this, because I don't want to use pre-packaged K-cups, but I wound up with grit and coffee grains and distinctly tepid, weak coffee.  I returned this product and do not recommend it at all.
review_title: Don't Waste Your Money Unless You Use Pre-Packaged K-Cups
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: TulsaTime
review_text: This is much too small, and the method of adding water is very confusing and messy. I returned it after one day.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Kathryn
review_text: This one went bad in 3 months. It s a Mini and this is the second one I couldn t get to work right. I m trying one more and then maybe I ll try some other brand. My old one worked years. These now work months.
review_title: Another one that clogs in record time
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Shell Seeker
review_text: I have only had the coffee pot for a couple of days.  Makes coffee ok,  but the quality of the coffee make is sad, sad, sad for the price!!! DO NOT pay extra for a color other than black!!!!  Very disappointed in the quality. I have no expectation it will hold up long.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Maggie's Mom
review_text: This is my 3rd keurig single cup and it has gone downhill. The plastic is thinner, the color is cheap looking,the functions are touchy and it is very loud. It is much flimsier made. Keurig, did you think your fans wouldn't notice. Shame on you.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Barbara Mackie
review_text: Owned a chili red but helped out my neighbor and gave her mine. She had 2 but gave to son's. When I saw the color JADE, a purchase had to be made. When buying new item I must rid old. Keurig has performed w/o one issue in last 2yrs of use. This time I went for the color. Thank You
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Thad
review_text: Bought it for the camper. Used it for about a week in May with no problems. Used it for road trip with camper to Colorado. Two days it work flawlessly. Used it again before hitting the road to go to Colorado worked. Got to camp ground, went to make a cup of coffee and it won't work now. Very disappointed!!!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Lorna
review_text: Love everything about it. I have it in a corner on my desk . It is very quiet. I love the  red color.  I was so surprised it did not come with a k-cup.  Coffee is excellent.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Ann F.
review_text: Love the Keurig single serve coffee maker. It gets used everyday. Easy to use and maintain. I use it with either a reusable filter or the SF Coffee Co. single cups, which are eco-friendly, biodegradable. Definitely, recommend this coffee maker.
review_title: Glad someone came up with the Keurig Single Serve
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: oz
review_text: Not Recommended.... My first machine is still going strong after about 5 years..... I recently purchased another one as a gift and it last one day ( 4 cups of coffee) before it broke. It seems like this machine has been redesigned and now is defective.... check out the 1 star reviews on Amazon..... this machine seems to have a lot of problems in 2017.... the defective machine purchased is being returned for a refund. I would be waery ordering the current model that is being sold.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Sheri P Corriher
review_text: I got this for my guest cottage and it is just perfect. Brews single cups but doesn't take up much of the limited space. I was even able to get the reusable cartridges for it so my regularly visiting family can ise their favorite coffee. Saves money and the landfill!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Bait
review_text: I like this design.  We had a version one Keurig that just wore out and we bought the new version 2 model, which takes too long to preheat and make a cup of coffee.  Besides you have to guess on the number of ounces in the cup you are using.  So we bought this single serve.  With this single serve, you just add put a cup full of water in and it heats and makes the coffee faster than the fancy version 2 model.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Sally Miller
review_text: This is a very poor machine.  We have ran maybe 10 cups of coffee through this and now it won't make a cup of coffee.  Heats up and then will not extract the water/coffee.  We have done the trouble shooting and to no avail.  A total waste of money.  Very disappointed!!!
review_title: Don't waste your money.  Very poor design.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Jennie
review_text: I have used this 3 or 4 times and now it will not make coffee. Just the tiniest bit of hot water comes out, even though the water chamber is full. I am so angry for wasting my money. Hopefully they will give me a refund for this horrible product
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Heather Besneli
review_text: Love this color and the compact size just perfect as I live in an apartment with not much kitchen space. I used to have a larger one years ago wouldn't fit here so I got rid of it. Love this one as put water in for each cup of coffee so no water standing in water reservoir think this is healthier
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Lucy Ray
review_text: I wanted a small Keurig as I am the only one using it.  Chose this based a lot on the color.  I love the red, and it goes great with other appliances in my kitchen.  I make just two cups a day, and so far it is holding up well, the coffee comes out great.  I am using other K-Cups besides the Keurig brand by the way...Very happy I chose this make and model.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Mike McGowan
review_text: Bought it for my ma to replace her older one.  I didn't even know it cam in colors besides black & red!  Her favorite color is blue o she loves it!!.  works like a charm from the get-go. works with both regular pods as well as re-fill pods.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: j.ketterman
review_text: I had to return my first one after 1 week when it stopped working. I had another sent to me to and it lasted a couple of weeks longer. This is after reviewing the instructions carefully, cleaning, and only using filtered water. I decided Keurig is no longer worth the hassle. I rather buy a cheaper brand. Pretty style, but it's garbage.
review_title: Experienced the same issue with 2 separate ones. Not worth it.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Amazon Customer
review_text: Great product! I had the OG gen 1 Keurig, a highly rated drip maker, and the best French press on Amazon: this is the perfect replacement for all of the above. A perfect 1 cup coffee maker paired with the San Francisco Bay Gourmet Coffee compostable K cups. Both make my 5am mornings MUCH more tolerable!
review_title: From a coffee snob: buy this
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: BT
review_text: My old Keurig took its last sputter after many, many years of service. I know I could most likely have had it repaired.  BUT I moved & my old one was black & I have a different color scheme now. The red is perfect!  I live alone, so a small machine works best. It makes a flawless cup of coffee with 3 levels for different sized cups!  I love   this machine!  We have a recurring date every morning
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Rebecca Moore
review_text: This is not a good product. At all. I am a previous full size keurig owner and it worked perfectly. I bought this keurig because I am now the only coffee drinker in the house and I wouldn t need a full size keurig and I wanted to save space on the countertop. Firstly, let me start off by saying you can only fill up to 10oz of water in the chamber and if you go over by even a drop, it leaks out. Secondly, the water does not get heated hot enough to brew a decent cup of joe. What I end up with in my cup is like warm coffee-bean-flavored water. Lastly, even if I drink a cup of this terrible coffee I still get a caffeine headache, which tells me I m basically just drinking water. This was such a waste of time and money and I m annoyed that I can t even return it.
review_title: This is not a good product. At all.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Judy
review_text: This is a great coffee maker if you only make a few cups a day.  After about 5 months the water stopped dripping through.  The customer service rep was fantastic and it was just a clog (fyi, if it clogs all you need to do is get a paperclip and poke the holes that surround the needle that punctures the pod). Also every so often run it with just water to wash any coffee grounds away.  Easy to use, easy to clean.
review_title: Easy to use, great customer service if needed.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Cam
review_text: I got this for my mom for mothers day and she loves it.  The only problem we have with it,  is that you can't fit large travel mugs under it.  And i just found out K cups are not biodegradable.  That seems odd since they're not that old.  Plus they're ridiculously over priced.  I miss my $30 coffee pot and Folders.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Loving mysteries, yoga & pilates
review_text: The machine operates as expected but the coffee is not hot enough for me.  It's more than warm but I'm disappointed in the temperature.  I put my cup in the microwave for 10-20 seconds to get it to a nice, hot temperature.  So far, this is  not an improvement over the K10 model (the previous mini Keurig machine).
review_title: But the coffee is NOT HOT :-(
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: MW
review_text: Awesome little Keurig! My husband uses this in his cubicle at work so his coffee machine stays all nice and hygienic (unlike the community coffee pot). He loves it.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Melissa Vargas
review_text: So far so good. We are really happy with our purchase.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Patricia A. Fox
review_text: I love this little Keurig.  It is perfect for a single person as myself.  I like the feature of no water reservoir, fresh water each cup.  It is much smaller than other models, takes up very little space on counter.  I highly recommend this.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: John P.
review_text: Lasted 1 month and 3 days before it stopped working!!!  On top of that, it's a very finicky model in that it will correctly make coffee if you incorrectly follow the exact steps to make a cup... too much water and it overflows, too little and it will ask for more... and don't even attempt to pour the water after you've put the pod in, you have to pour it prior!  My ex- wife was less complicated!!!
review_title: Spend a little more for a better model...
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Judith D. Collins
review_text: I have been using the single serve compact K-cup Keurig for years.  I still have my older one.  I had several over the years and some last and some do not.  My last one has been great and used it for many years.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Daizy
review_text: I love this Keurig machine. I definitely taste a huge difference in my coffee using the Keurig. It has more flavor and even smells better. It fits great under the cabinets and there's still plenty of room to fill it with water. I like that it doesn't have a reservoir. I don't drink coffee everyday and I didn't want to worry about water sitting in the reservoir. It's easy to use. I like being able to control the length of the cord. I wish more products used that option.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Amazon Customer
review_text: Purchased this for my elderly parents who like a warm beverage but downsized and didn t want a big coffee maker. Worked for less than 6 weeks - water would not exit the reservoir and made maybe 3 tablespoons of coffee. My parents would waste pods thinking they did something wrong, not that Keurig is selling an inferior defective product. Guess the reason for 4 weeks to return is because keurig knows it won t last much longer.....
review_title: Not worth even One star....But Amazon won t allow you to go lower....
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Michelle W.
review_text: Before purchasing i did a lot of research on single serve pod coffee makers & came across this little number which compared to others satisfied my need. Only con is that travel mugs 16oz are still too tall to fit but thats not a big deal too me. Definitely recommend this model!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Emma
review_text: A lot of plastic but I do like it and it's ease of using.  I like the fact that water isn't stored in a reservoir.  You make 1 cup at a time. I had a larger Keurig with a large reservoir which kept the water present even if you were making one cup.  It could get stale
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: LisaS
review_text: This is perfect for my small family.  We don't drink coffee often, but this is perfect for making just one cup.  You have to fill the well everytime so water doesn't sit and get stale.  And my 12 year old daughter easily uses this to make hot chocolate for herself!  I can't believe I actually waited and debated getting this!  I LOVE!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Jo
review_text: I bought this for my office but like it so much I am going to buy another one for home!  Perfect cup of coffee. Small, convenient, easy to use and a perfect cup of coffee! Now I can use pods or fresh ground coffee with the separate filter that I bought. I am very happy with this purchase.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Just Tom
review_text: I have purchased several generic K Cup brewers, all worked great, making great coffee with K Cups or regular coffee,  Got a great deal on this one thu warehouse deals, works great, CLEANED as instructed before first use.  Very pleased. I have never been a fan of coffee makers that have the water reservoir on the sides, great one up brewer.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Pablo
review_text: After only ten days the machine quit working. I mean dead. I used it maybe five times. I guess I'm late to the party, but I  have finally decided Kureig are completely undependable and unreliable. The longest one I owned lasted two years and then the motor burned out. At some point your  machine is going to quit working. Have had several but this one was the worse. If you simply lift the lid to pour in water, it leaks out around the base. Somehow, tilting open the cup holder seals off the reservoir but you get to learn this through trial and error. This last time, the reservoir leaked anyway and the machine just quit working. Kureig customer service is horrible. They are impossible to make actual contact with a live person. If you get lucky you are routed to a worthless technician who is no help and who then re-routes you to a voicemail that gives you detailed instructions on how to return the Kureig to the factory (at your expense). Two - six week turnaround time. Maybe longer.  I've really had it with Kureig products. I don't recommend them at all.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Ann Gurley
review_text: got a variety of cups..not trying others on line...NOTE; must pust lower on button, then lift lid and add water then the blue light comes on top buttom blinks..press to make it red.  Was abt. to send mine back til I figured this out. ..scrambled it's brain...all well now. love it.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: grammyV
review_text: I never had a Keurig and I love it. I bought the refillable pods so I can use my own decaf. The variety box had some great coffees in it too. I is sooooo easy to use and fast. Love the red!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Amazon Customer
review_text: TOOK A LITTLE BIT TO GET USED TO HOW TO MEASURE THE CUP SIZE, BUT OVERALL GREAT PRODUCT
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: GARY L ENGLISH
review_text: I love this coffee maker!  My hubby got it for me as a Valentine's/birthday gift!  It makes the perfect cup of coffee, cocoa, or any hot drink!  He also purchased little filters to add coffee as we just opened a 3 lbs can.  The coffee tastes great and it looks great on the counter!  I repeat I LOVE this coffee maker!
review_title: Best new thing since sliced bread!!!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: M. A. Pinto
review_text: This is my third Keurig, really liked the idea of smaller size as have limited space in kitchen. Worked well for about a month or less , then the water would not expel the coffee into the cup. Tiny drops and then nothing. My original Keurig lasted 10 years before the same thing happened.
review_title: really liked the idea of smaller size as have limited space ...
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Jeffrey L Sutton
review_text: I like it but  they did not tell you it is 80%plus plastic even the handle.. I will be shocked if it last 6 months.  The tray is hard to push back in and the plate the cup sits on is plastic.  So far so good.  I had the large Keurig for over 10 years no problem but it took up too much counter space since wife doesn't drink coffee.  We shall wait & see..
review_title: I like it but they did not tell you it is ...
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Steve Georgi
review_text: This machine died less than 2 months after I purchased it.  My first Keurig lasted over 5 years.  As this is the least expensive model I think they make them poorly so you will "move up" to a more expensive model.  I have gone back to using a peculator.  Way less expensive, better for the environment and I get hot, not tepid coffee.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: David B. Lori Green
review_text: Absolute junk.  First one crapped out in less than 6 months.  We figured to give it another try because of the price.  The second one crapped out after the 2nd use.
review_title: Absolute junk. First one crapped out in less than ...
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Kindle Customer
review_text: I have had these types of Keurig's before and find them not particularly sturdy, but acceptable.  I was slightly disappointed with the color - it was more "mint green" than "green apple green" and doesn't really match my other appliances, but that is a really difficult thing to predict.
review_title: ... types of Keurig's before and find them not particularly sturdy, but acceptable
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: jcmpdr
review_text: We have purchased 2 of these coffee makers.  The last one was in August.  My husband only drinks one cup a day and I don't drink any coffee.  In less than a year, this one stopped working just like the last.  The water now only drips through the pod to make a cup of coffee.  It never does fill the cup.  I have cleaned it and it doesn't matter.  I thought the first one might have been a lemon.  Now, I realize that it's just not a well-made product.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: tutty
review_text: Update 10/24 it stopped brewing correctly after two months of use not recommended.  works fine no issues up to now and bought it used. Coffee could be hotter cause if you use a cold flaverd creamer it makes coffee warm quick that didnt happen with my drip mr   coffee maker. Otherwise it is cheaper made than the other keurig models but does the job for one cup at a time consistently. Get a reusable kcup the purple fill n save cups worked well .  Have Java Day !
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: SKML
review_text: I received this product on October 19, 2017.  Today is February 21, 2018, and the machine won't even turn on.  I teach high school, and I prefer to keep a machine in my room.  I'll order another coffee maker; it will not; however, be a Keurig.
review_title: I received this product on October 19, 2017. ...
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: TG Taylor
review_text: These machines have been around for awhile and they never improve on this model. It still does not fit larger cups without releasing the drip guard and forget about mugs. It is fine for daily Keurig drinking but it will stop working in a year and I will insanely buy this out of desperation
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Allie
review_text: I received this today and the box was broken and poorly taped together. When I opened it,  the machine was wet with coffee! It was dirty,  scratched and used.  I'm really disappointed.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: MccAL
review_text: Used for late night study sessions. Works well in the college dorm room, but can be a bit noisy when it is getting ready to brew a cup. Have not had any of the issues that I read about; no water leaking out everywhere, no waiting 30 mins for a cup to brew. It has been a great little feature! Used multiple times with no issues!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Raj Nakkiran
review_text: This is a very badly designed product.  The heater burnt out in 1 month and 5 days. ( So unable to return ). Also the user interface is bad. The water level sensor does not work all the time and there is no way to recover for some timeouts other than pulling the plug and inverting upside down, possibly pouring hot water all over.
review_title: VERY BAD DESIGN, BROKE IN 35 days.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: gcpearl
review_text: Well I bought this last July 2017 and it is already broken! I saw a few unhappy people with this situation when I purchased it but thought it must have been a fluke with them. LOL anyway can anyone tell me how to go about doing something about this with an Amazon purchase? I'm sick and I just don't have time to research everything! To tell the truth... Aggravated! No power at all to the machine won't even come on or light up or anyting it's just dead like a doornail! Anyone have any advice? Please no you have to give it at least one star to even get the post posted.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Nancy Locklear
review_text: I love the smaller size of this keuring. I had an older model that was much larger.  I like that there is not a reservoir where water could sit for days.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Diane A
review_text: We got this for my dad as a gift for Christmas after he saw our full-sized keurig and seemed a little jealous/very impressed. He was so excited to receive this and the single serve design works well for him and my mom. It's still going strong 2 months later and the red is a snappy color (plus it was way cheaper)!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: granice
review_text: i dont't like. not hot enough.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Emily
review_text: Worked for 2 months and then quit making coffee....  Tried to make coffee one morning, following same light prompts on the machine as usual, no coffee came out. Well, maybe three drops of coffee, came out, but only three drops.  We drained the water and repeated the procedure of following the light prompts and again, no coffee.  We tried this process five times that morning, then proceeded to the department store and bought another BRAND of coffee maker.  I will never choose this particular coffee maker again.
review_title: Worked for 2 months and then quit making coffee. ...
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: KLA
review_text: I wanted this coffee maker because I do not make coffee often and wanted one that didn't store water. So, I bought this just over a year ago and have used less than 15 times, and it no longer works. Looks like the pump failed, as the water will not come out after heating.  I can't return this to Amazon as it's past the return date, so I'm really disappointed in the quality and would hope Keurig would stand behind a product that has had minimal use, even if purchased only a year ago. Do not buy this!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Westport Gal
review_text: My second one!  Had to give up the first one after nearly four years because the taste of the coffee became altered by scale.  When I descaled it, the unit never worked the same.  But, I love this little Keurig so much that I've purchased a new one.
review_title: I love this little Keurig so much that I've purchased a ...
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Martydtw
review_text: Bought for our new camper, small and the cord retracts into the unit for better storage.
review_title: Perfect size for 1 cup at a time
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: David Van Riper
review_text: This is the biggest piece of crap. Do not buy this piece of garbage. It either leaks water everywhere or does not make a coffee. When you put water in either nothing comes out or you never know how much coffee it makes. If you put too much it leaks water everywhere. There is no room to put an 8 oz coffee cup underneath so you have to remove the drip tray. I was informed by product support that you can not put more than 10 OZ  of water or it will leak out everywhere. If you attempt to put in less than 10OZ you will not get a cup of coffee it does nothing. Product support is garbage.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Kindle Customer
review_text: It didn't work for even 2 weeks! I've been away on business and now discover the return window was only a month. We flooded out here in Houston and I bought this since we lost our bigger Keurig. Now I'm stuck without anything.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Roger L. Conway
review_text: Nothing as frustrating as waking up to a new coffee maker that has only lasted a few weeks. I own two K 15's one only lasted for a couple weeks! The other is temperamental. It works most of the time. I use water from a reverse osmosis system and low mineral content. I clean according to instructions. My original reservoir unit has lasted better than 3 years. Coffee does not taste as good a single coffee maker. I had a K 10 and that one lasted a little less than 18 months.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Jamie
review_text: I have been a Keurig customer for about 7 years and I am done. Never again will I buy one of these machines. When it works, it's awesome but it doesn't always work. This latest one that I bought only lasted about 3 months and then just stopped working. I can hear the machine going but coffee won't come out. Thankfully I've always kept a reliable drip coffee maker around for when my Keurig decides not to work.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Fiesty
review_text: When I found this product I was excited as it was smaller and less expensive than your normal keurig. That excitement lasted only a few short weeks. As it heats ours now leaks water into the cup. The coffee it puts out is barely coffee. It s more water than anything else. The only plus of the product was soze and I liked that it did not hold water allowing it to become stale. But due to it short lived life of actually doing what it should I would not suggest this product.
review_title: The only plus of the product was soze and I liked that it did not hold water allowing it to ...
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: justin
review_text: Owned for less than a month and it will not turn on. I've honestly only used this thing 4-5 times. Do, not buy this piece of garbage. My parents have an older Keurig model at their home and have never had any problems with it. I've seen some reviews that say the newer models are crap and will burn out on you if left plugged in too long... I guess that's what happened but I feel like I just threw away $60. Now I'm stuck with boxes of K-cups. I probably will just give them to my parents.
review_title: not buy this piece of garbage. My parents have an older Keurig model at ...
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Jones1313
review_text: In less than 30 days, machine seemed to just stop brewing (button would turn red and then just cut off).  Then it just started working again. However, I always have to hit it twice to make it turn red and start to brew.  It doesn't automatically turn on after the water is heated as the instructions indicate.  I just use it that way, because returning it was too much of a hassle.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: larry
review_text: Had another one that lasted for years.  Finally given up the ghost we purchased this one.  It works better then the old one by brewing coffee much faster.  Happy with it.
review_title: It works better then the old one by brewing coffee much faster
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: 3rdtimer
review_text: I got my first one as a gift 5 years ago. It was still working when I gave it to a friend because my wife wanted a silver one. Once you get used to the way it works you grow fond of it. Their more complicated water tank models are fine I am sure but we want simplicity and reliability...like this model.
review_title: Liked It So Much We Bought Another One.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Kindle Customer
review_text: Used this once when it first arrived just to make sure it worked.  Learned today when a guest went to use it that it doesn't work at all.  It continually insists that it needs water and won't operate no matter how much is added.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Edwin K. Margulies
review_text: Worst Keurig. Has to heat water every time it is used, even brewing 2 cups back to back. Cannot brew anything other than mild coffee.
review_title: Annoying, a ZERO for everything.  Embarrassment for Keurig.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Betty Duck
review_text: Perfect one cup at a time maker.  Have to follow the directions on keeping k-cup top "up" while pouring in the water otherwise the water spills out and under the maker.  It seems to brew perfectly.  I like the silver aluminum color.  It is not shiny.
review_title: Perfect one cup at a time maker
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Chicago mom
review_text: I bought this coffee maker for my son's dorm room -- it is compact, easy to fill and doesn't break down.  It is a common sight in dorm rooms at the college my son attends.  So far, it is working great.  I bought it with the Amazon K-cup assortment -- great bargain and also a good way to tast different K cup offerings to see which type of coffee to buy regularly
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Yoga Anyone?
review_text: This is so obviously used! That is completely unacceptable, I'm furious. The box is wet!!! Leaking from the water reservoir with fingerprints and coffee stains. GROSS!
review_title: The product received was NOT new
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: john bauer
review_text: Worst coffee maker ever , the  use n care guide   supplied w/ the K15 has Keurig Hot as a heading after several calls to customer service dept. it was explained to me the heating element is smaller n 100-120 degs is normal ( which equals warm coffee NOT HOT!!)when it is deposited in a ceramic cup. Also I ordered a 30 cup assortment of what I thought would be an assortment of coffees,TURNS OUT IT IS MOSTLY TEAS N HOT CHOCLOT , it uses more coffee grounds n delivers a weeker Cup of only warm coffee then my old 10 cup coffee maker VARY DISOPOINTED WITH THE KEURIG K15!!!!!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Mark
review_text: This Keurig replaces the original I bought about 7-8 years ago. The exact same model, just newer and in an awesome color! Love the convenience of a Keurig and that I can do a single cup of coffee and not have to brew and waste a whole pot when I only want the one (or two) cup. Great quality. Just wish the k-cups were a little cheaper.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: blue  stocking
review_text: I have bought and returned numerous models of Keurig. They all break down after around 3 months. This one only dribbles out half the amt of water I put in the reservoir and does not forcefully express the water anymore. Might produce a half cup of coffee, might not. So disgusted.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: hippie gypsy
review_text: I like Keurig brewers, but this one started acting up within the first week. Only 5 cups brewed and I can't get a full cuppa in the morning. It seemed to straighten itself out for a while. Two months later, the same issue. One month later (yesterday), the same issue. I clean this thing every 3-4 days. It is used to brew 1 cup in the morning...that is it.
review_title: Trouble from Week 1 - the cup is only 1/2 full - built-in obsolescence...
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: C. A. Lee
review_text: I love this little coffee maker. It makes coffee fast and hot. Easy to use. My husband and myself live in a big two story colonial. Our bedroom is upstairs so this little prize lives there. I don't even have to venture downstairs, while have awake. I can make coffee upstairs,while half awake now.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Tia Whitlock
review_text: This machine is compact, of course and I love it's simplicity. The best thing about it is that it's very durable. Its my third time purchasing one as they make great gifts.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: LT
review_text: I love this little guy! I like it because you can make as big of a cup of coffee as you want (of course within the parameters of the water container).  It does take a little bit to heat up and pour, as a warning, but the sleek design and the price make this a must have. I like it actually a lot better than my regular keurig that I had before.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Mrs.Peep
review_text: I love Keurig Single Serve.  I'm the only one who drinks coffee, so it's perfect!  They last as long as they last...a year...a couple of years and I buy a new one.  Not expensive.  Coffee's great!  Happy Camper!
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Amazon Customer
review_text: So I ordered one of these a year ago for my old apartment and about 2 months ago it pooped out and would make noise, absorb water but would not dispense and we could not figure out why not so because its only around $70 we just bought a new one, got it in yesterday, hoping it lasts longer but the last one went through a lot of use and one move so assuming it was just a fluke. 3.5 stars due to that and the fact that the space to put your coffee mug is very short and cant take a large mug.
review_title: One down, got another one. Pray for me
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

review_text: Not the easiest to use. Coffee is not always hot. Water level is not accurate at all.

review_text: Works pretty well but seems to be made with cheap plastic. I've had it for a few months and although it's working, it's making a strange noise now.

review_text: I am very disappointed in this coffee maker.  I use a large one at home and bought this for our RV.  The coffee was too weak no matter how much water I put in the reservoir. Definitely not the same quality as the larger model. Sending this back!w

product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

review_text: I use this for my personal morning brew, so I don t have to go downstairs for my java sometimes it s just hard to wake up. It does take a bit longer to brew than the full-size keurig but its small footprint makes up for the extra minute.

review_text: I have previously owned  Keurig.  It lasted about 21/2 years and stopped working.  I recently purchased a  new one from Amazon.

name: Robert Blodgett
review_text: Small compact good 10oz  cup of coffee, if you are looking for a machine that makes more than one cup rapidly this is not the one for you. But if you are looking for a compact machine for one you or two cups as you sit at you desk this more tha fits the bill.

review_text: Bought this while doing a complete apt. remodel,which took months.

name: TechPeople
review_text: I bought two units replace two of the same I had for several years.  I was worried about what is growing in the water reservoir/chamber after all these years. There is no way to see inside the water reservoir.  These new units are the same as the old ones, just new packaging.  I mean cardboard packaging,  Both of the new units have a electrical HUM when plugged in.  So I unplug after each use.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Amazon Customer
review_text: Don't buy it!!!!! I read and followed the user guide, but I never got a cup of coffee. i re-read their user guide and tried several more times; the POS would make noises like it was boiling the water, then a pumping noise, then all quiet, but no coffee. i finally added more water, pushed all the buttons, raised and lowered all the lids and handles. after a "pop" noise it sent out all 18 oz, what a mess. SO, bottom line, buy one of the cheaper Keurig copies,not a genuine Keurig POS.
review_title: the POS would make noises like it was boiling the water

review_text: This is the 2nd one we have purchased. we like them very much.

product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

review_title: I use the larger one and wanted a little one ...

name: CaliGirl
review_text: I love this Keurig (K15), I take it with me on trips all the time, it is easy to use, and convenient and compact. The cup tray can be removed when brewing so you can fit larger cups under it and so there is no need to buy special size cups.
product_name: Keurig K15 Single Serve Compact K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker

name: Tracy Compton
review_text: I wish I returned this it s horrible it literally barely hold a cup of water and if you overfill it even slightly it leaks all over my counter I m ready to just throw it in the trash I don t know what small cup of coffee are supposed to make with this but not one any of The basic coffee cups I own. Just a crappy product!!!
review_title: If you would like to drink a half a cup of coffee I guess this will suit you
